en.title: Congratulations! FE Winner of the 4th Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand 2008!
en.content: It is happening! FE's efforts to build a global brand are being organized by the industry. FE would like to take this opportunity to thank the organizing committee of the Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand for selecting FE as the winner of this prestigious award. Thank you!

meta.description: It is happening! FE's efforts to build a global brand is being recognised by the industry. FE would like to take this opportunity to thank the organizing committee of the Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand for selecting FE as the winner of this prestigious award. Thank you!
meta.keyword: Congratulations! FE Winner of the 4th Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand 2008!
meta.author: klhunter
